text_en: It is not easy to move around on your own when you are visually impaired.
text_sw: Siyo rahisi kutembea huku na huko ukiwa peke yako kama una ulemavu wa macho.

text_en: When we are together we can help each other!

text_sw: Sisi ni watu wa rika moja!

text_en: It is nice running around in a big compound without obstacles.
text_sw: Ni furaha kukimbia huku na huko katika eneo kubwa lisilo na vizuizi.

text_en: We are happy and can move around like every other child.
text_sw: Tuna furaha, na tunaweza kuzunguka maeneo haya kama watoto wengine.

text_en: It is fun to play in a limited playground without obstacles.
text_sw: Ni furaha kucheza katika eneo finyu lisilo na vizuizi.
